challenge.title: Dr. Neal Barnard - Tackling diabetes with a bold new dietary approach
challenge.description: Dr. Neal Barnard's TED talk discusses how a whole food, plant-based diet can directly address chronic Type II diabetes.
challenge.instructions: Watch Neal Barnar'd TED talk on YouTube.
